item.title: Triggering Action: Participatory Surveillance and Event Detection in Public Emergency Management
item.description: Our chapter is informed by work that theorizes the relationship between knowledge of populations and modes of governance.

item.title: ICT4S 2029: What Will Be the Systems Supporting Sustainability in 15 Years?
item.description: What is your vision for systems that will be supporting sustainability in 15 years?

item.title: Detecting the Visible: The Discursive Construction of Health Threats in a Syndromic Surveillance System Design
item.description: Information and communication technologies are not value-neutral tools that reflect reality; they privilege some forms of action, and they limit others.
